snippet: While attention has been focused on nominating contests in the West and Midwest this week, a contest in Maine is offering another test of the candidates' strengths, on the East Coast.
abstract: While attention has been focused on nominating contests in the West and Midwest this week, a contest in Maine is offering another test of the candidates' strengths, on the East Coast.
lead_paragraph: While attention has been focused on nominating contests in the West and Midwest this week, a contest in Maine is offering another test of the candidates' strengths, on the East Coast.

headline.main: Taking the Slow Vote in Maine
